content:
This valueset contains duplicate entries for code 408460008: http://build.fhir.org/valueset-c80-practice-codes.html

Is this an error? Or is it allowed?
technically, it's allowed. but that case is clearly an error:
When this valueset is expanded, will the expansion contain the duplicates with different displays? I'm assuming no because it will only ever match the one code in the code system (i.e. SNOMED)
in this case it would be bad. but there are use cases where it actually makes sense. We've discussed them here previously.
Ok I can trawl through the discussions here to find that out. But if you happen to have the links to the discussions directly then that would be very helpful.

this:
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/terminology/subject/Expansion.20Question

and these are relevant:
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/terminology/subject/How.20to.20properly.20represent.20Synonyms
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/terminology/subject/MDC.20question
